content:
Tasks are not available for Google calendars unless they are configured to synchronize using the provider for google calendar add-on. https://addons.thunderbird.net/en-US/thunderbird/addon/provider-for-google-calendar/

The cal dav synchronization only synchronizes the calendar.
creator: MattAuSupport

content:
Have you considered filing a bug? https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/home

I really don't think anything useful will be achieved in a peer support forum.
creator: MattAuSupport

content:

content: Have you tried scrolling to the very bottom of the email to see if it is append on the end. See https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/signatures#w_signature-position
creator: MattAuSupport

content: Thanks very much, Yes, it is showing there. sorry for being so ignorant. I selected the option to place my signature below my reply and now it is showing where I want it to be.
creator: linley.hodges
